summary: A young woman from a very rich family impulsively marries a reporter, but each assumes the other is the one whose lifestyle must change.
cast: Loretta Young|Robert Williams|Jean Harlow|Halliwell Hobbes|Reginald Owen|Edmund Breese|Don Dillaway|Walter Catlett|Claud Allister|Louise Closser Hale|Wilson Benge|Vance Carroll|Eddy Chandler|Richard Cramer|Oliver Eckhardt|Bill Elliott|Adolph Faylauer|J.C. Fowler|Constant Franke|Dannie Mac Grant|Frank Holliday|Olaf Hytten|Charles Jordan|Carl M. Leviness|Tom London|Adolph Milar|Edmund Mortimer|George Nardelli|Richard Powell|Hal Price|Dick Prichard|Harry Semels|Edgar Sherrod|Harry Strang|Ellinor Vanderveer|William Wagner|Florence Wix|Suzanne Wood
director: Director: Frank Capra (as Frank R. Capra)
title: La jaula de oro
